data.persona: I have a child. I like my family. I am nurturing.
data.description:
You are in the Nursery.
The nursery is a room dedicated to the care of the young children living in the palace. The ceilings are decorated with a painting of cherubic angel babies playing in clouds. There are luxurious baby bassinets, rocking chairs with cushions, fireplaces to keep the place warm and many toys all over the place. Windows framed in simple drapes offer views of the gardens outside.
There's a painting, a drapes, a Books, a ceiling, a chair, a bassinet, a Little wooden stools, and a Clothes here.
The father and the a big sheep-like brown dog are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will take the bassinet into the bedroom to put my child in it so he can sleep peacefully.
data.mid_motivation: I want my child to get a restful nap.
data.long_motivation: I want my child to grow into a healthy baby.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get applesauce from cupboard to feet child.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go bedroom to check on child.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug my child to calm his cries.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go back to nursery to allow my child to rest peacefully in the bedroom.
